metadata.title: North Pacific Salmonid Coded Wire Tag (CWT) Database

creators.name: Auke Bay Laboratory (ABL), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic

metadata.description:
Salmonid coded wire tag recoveries

Measurement Details
CWT recovery database including data on: hatchery of origin (when present), location of tagging, location of tag recovery, weight, length, and sex of tagged fish, and vessel and fishing gear used in recovery

tag recoveries have occurred throughout the Subarctic North Pacific.

Other Comments
provided by Michael Dahlberg pH: (907)789-6000

A TCODE project
